channel.title: Tax Day!!!!
channel.description:
Its Tax Day in the USA so lets talk about taxes and stuff. I owed negative taxes so I'm not particularly pissed off, but there's some astroturf rallies in DC going on that you can watch on CNN.
Insert debate here.

item.title: Tax Day!!!!
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Section 861 is a portion of the law that is misconstrued to mean that only non-resident aliens (or Americans getting their income from non-US sources) are subject to being taxed. This is, of course, malarkey.

As for the 16th Amendment, well, there are some that suggest that the 16th Amendment isn’t in force because they say that the ratification process did not succeed. Which is, also, hogwash.

More info and responses to most of the arguments made by tax protesters can be found here:
https://www.irs.gov/pub/irs-utl/friv_tax.pdf

Read full topic

item.title: Tax Day!!!!
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
I mean: What exactly is this 861 position or the meaning of the 16th amendment talked about in those videos posted above, and how could they make it possible to legally avoid paying taxes in America? Or if they can’t - why not then? I am curious about such things.

Read full topic

item.title: Tax Day!!!!
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
DansonDelta40:

As a German I obviously have no idea whether or not this thing about American income taxes is true or not.

It’s not.

Read full topic

item.title: Tax Day!!!!
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
Needs moar conspiracy theories for the lulz:

Paying Income Tax is Voluntary

Why you should not pay

You don’t have to pay income taxes?

Ron Paul: Paying Income Tax is Unconstitutional

There are any more to find in the videos linked to those above, so I will leave it at that. As a German I obviously have no idea whether or not this thing about American income taxes is true or not. And I am not siding with conspiracy theorists again. I just put them out here for you to discuss. If you feel like it, you can try to find out if there really isn’t any law that tells you to pay income taxes, or if there is even a law against it. Sadly, this point is not so debatable over here in Germany.

Have fun discussing everyone!

Read full topic

item.title: Tax Day!!!!
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Ramirezoid: Even though they use government a lot more than those that are not wealthy do?

And if it is a flat tax you’re advocating, that burdens the poor far more than it does the rich. How? Well, Bob makes $15k/year. Steve makes $1.5mil/year. Bob’s living expenses equal $13k/year, leaving $2k disposable. Steve’s living expenses are $500k/year, leaving $1mil disposable. Both are then taxed at the same 30% rate. Bob’s tax bill is $600. Steve’s is $300k. Bob has $1400 left. Steve has $700k left. Which is burdened more with the bill?

But it is irrelevant as Steve is taking more of the pie than Bob is; why shouldn’t he pay more?

Read full topic

item.title: Tax Day!!!!
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Them: “Aren’t you angry that you’re being forced to pay?”
Me: “Yes. I’m angry every time I have to pay for my housing. I’m angry every time I go to the cashier at the supermarket and am required to give away my hard earned money. I’m getting sick and tired of watching my money fly out the window to my Internet Service Provider, my utilities, transportation costs…”
Them: “…”
Me: “No, I’m not angry at having to pay for things I use, and that includes paying taxes. Are you?”

Read full topic
